column4: anyone can advise me a mass rename file? i have 500+ files, which has to be renamed to each something different, but i have the filenames in a list
For example, file1.txt, file2.txt, file3.txt .. or are they all random?
How do you want to rename them?
I mean.. text1.txt is to be renamed to what?
the files are (track01.mp3, ...) and have to be renamed to (artist - song.mp3) but I have the titles in a txt
Umm.. cut and paste the top line of your titles txt file...
You have 500 files.. with the song names in a text file..
How do you relate the filename to the song name?
Is the filename and the song name in the file together?
So how do you relate a filename to a song name?
don't understand what you mean, the txt files just have the titles of the song in it like = " 01 Real love" ....
Okay.. If you have a filename song1.mp3 .. How do you know what to rename the mp3 file to?
artist - songname.mp3 but the artist is not hard to add, so just "songname.mp3"
Give me actual examples of the mp3 filenames.. and also some examples of the song names in the text files..
In a private chat if you want..
